Oyuncu dediğin adam bu oyunu illaki oynamalıdır... Half Life lorenu en çok sevdiğim oyunlardan biridir benim. Oyun eski olmasına rağmen optimzasyonu ve grafikleri halen güzel ve taş gibi. Hikaye anlamında eksik bir oyun olduğunu düşünüyorum ancak daha sonra gelen "episode"lar ile bu eksikliği kapatmışlar. Kısacası alın ,oynayın değer.

Half-Life 2 - это эпохальная и знаковая игра для игровой индустрии. Игра которая очень появлияла на игры в целом. Все в этой игре реализовано было просто превосходно. Half-Life 2 в плане графики и физики опередила время. Мне Half-Life 2 нравится и я регулярно перепрохожу эту замечательную игру.

Невероятная физика. Графика которая даже сейчас смотрится очень неплохо. Потрясающий сюжет, саундтрек.

Half-Life 2 рекомендую. Стоит пройти.

It's Half Life, of course I recommend it. One of the greatest, most revolutionary and absolutely brilliant franchises. A must play for anyone, it really sets a good standard for what a game should accomplish at its core

One of the best games of its time and still is.
I remember this came out when I was a lot younger and the graphics then, running on the old hardware I had at the time, were absolutely phenomenal. And to this day... They still are. This game is one of the best trilogies that was ever created and love them to this day. Sometimes I find myself coming back and replaying all of them like I am watching a cinema series on TV! The game totally grasps your attention from the start playing as the main charactor named Gorden Freeman(who this day in the games doesn't say a single word like in the first dead space charactor  you play). I sometimes ask some people if they have ever heard of Half-Life and I am somewhat amazed that some of them have not (usually people who are console players) This game is a must have in my book.
lo mejor que puedes jugar en tu vida
The wrong person in the wrong time makes all the diff-erence
Physics in a video game is actually fun, who knew?

Good game.
Big improvement from HL1!

Half-Life 2 to gra science fiction, FPS akcji. Bardzo fajnie się grało, grafika pomimo biegu lat wcale nie jest taka zła; mi się podoba, muzyka w grze występuje ale raczej rzadko. Błędów nie znalazłem co jest ogromnym plusem dla antyku takowego. W grze występowały elementy łamigłówkowe co dla mnie jest na plus. Gra posiada swoją fabułą, w którą o dziwo się nie wczułem, więc pod względem fabularnym jestem ubogi. W 3/4 gry nie chciało mi się grać; musiałem się przymuszać aby ukończyć grę. Jednak dla serii Half-Life należy się jednak szacunek, gdyż to właśnie one stanowiły podstawę do powstania gier z serii Counter Strike. Polecam nawet kurcze!

Ver el juego que inspiró tantas creaciones interesantes en el mundo del shooter es increíble, pero pues, jugar el origen es igual jugar los errores del inicio, por lo que muchas partes se vuelven aburridas al no tener música o algunas texturas no cargan. Adquierelo en oferta o en bundle, la historia es 8/10 pero el gameplay es rápido y frenético, divertido.

Half-life 2 es la secuela del mítico Half-life. En este juego, ya no nos encontraremos en las instalaciones de Black Mesa, sino en las ciudades de este mismo mundo. Durante la aventura tendrás una experiencia enriquecedora de la experiencia ya ofrecida en el Half-life. Half-life 2 tiene todo lo que tenia Half-life pero mejorado, y agregando algunas mecánicas que hacen mas disfrutable el juego.

It's Half-Life 2.

On a serious note, this game has been incredibly fun to play for the first time (I already knew speedrun tech though so trying to play the game incorrectly was where a lot of the fun came from). I very much love the Half-Life universe and am excited to continue playing.
El es Gordon Freeman, una historia hermosa.

Half-Life 2 is just fantastic in every way possible. The aftermath of the Black Mesa experiment being twisted into something I bet people never expected to see between the release of the original and this one. This game has basically raised me, since I played it a lot when I was younger. I wish I could play this game for the first time again. But, to keep this review a bit short, Kudos to Valve, and please release Half Life 3 already.
i mean... its not bad its just too good for humanity bec tbh if i could i would happily end humanity

Great playthrough. I have to say, I was concerned when I bought this that it might not be my thing; I don't think it's advertised very well as to what it really is. My review should help with that.

I would describe Half Life 2 as a mixture of (and, in some cases, a precursor to or partial inspiration for) the following, with the following percentages:

- 35% Half Life 1 (general feel of the gameplay/controls/level design, gun fights, helicopters, military, etc., same characters and storyline, portals, science, radiation, aliens)
- 20% Nazi Germany (stormtroopers, fascism, propaganda + indoctrination, oppression, raids); this was a very interesting and fun twist btw
- 15% Mirror's Edge (rebellion, gun fights, swift thinking and running, jumping climbing etc. puzzles); there are a lot of cases where the game keeps you on your toes and you have to think fast
- 10% Left 4 Dead (particularly the Ravenholm level); if those games weren't heavily inspired by Ravenholm I would be shocked
- 2% Terminator movies (dystopian war/battles against machines)
- 2% War of the Worlds movie (dystopian war against towering aliens)
- 2% The Matrix movies (conspiracy of control from machine overlords, people being slaves and in pods)
- 2% Portal (portals (kinda), turrets, Portal shoes, energy balls); Portal definitely "stole" some of these things
- 2% Monsters Inc. (yes lol, the human pods on rails remind me of the MI doors on rails ^^)
- 10% Nothing else much that I can think of (the girl Alyx, long levels involving an airboat and a go kart thing)

With that, I think one can get a very clear picture of whether and how much they will like HL2.

I previously played Half Life 1 (twice) and its Opposing Force and Blue Shift games on hard and liked them (except for Blue Shift, kinda), and I just finished playing this on hard. I very much look forward to playing the rest of the HL2 games: Lost Coast, Episode One, Episode Two.

P.S. There's also a Half Life: Decay game not many know about which was built for PS2 for co-op only that I want to try, and it seems they've unofficially ported it to PC as a mod for HL; it also is apparently playable in SP mode by switching characters. Minerva also looked interesting and highly related, though it's technically a different game.
